name: Red Dungeon
description:
An ancient Beast stalks the caverns of the Red Dungeon, and it has chosen you as its prey. Summon all of your courage and make your escape in a nail-biting endless runner/platformer. Steal the souls of all those who stand in your way to bargain with the Soothsayer for a tale of the dungeon’s horrors. But remember the one truth of the Dungeon: there is no way out.

Controls:

Space Bar (recommended), W, or Up Arrow to Jump

D or Right Arrow (recommended) for Dash

Esc to Pause

Space Bar to Respawn

Additional Notes: 

-Souls/Shop Progress are not saved on exit.
